SELECT COUNT(a.ATCH_FILE_ID) FROM COMTN_FILE a INNER JOIN COMTN_FILE_DETAIL b ON a.ATCH_FILE_ID = b.ATCH_FILE_ID WHERE a.USE_AT = 'Y'
AND b.STRE_FILE_NM LIKE '%'|| #{searchKeyword} ||'%'
AND b.ORIGNL_FILE_NM LIKE '%'|| #{searchKeyword} ||'%'

SELECT a.ATCH_FILE_ID , b.FILE_CN , b.FILE_SN , b.FILE_STRE_COURS , b.STRE_FILE_NM , b.FILE_EXTSN , b.FILE_TYPE , b.ORIGNL_FILE_NM , b.FILE_SIZE , a.CREAT_DT FROM COMTN_FILE a INNER JOIN COMTN_FILE_DETAIL b ON a.ATCH_FILE_ID = b.ATCH_FILE_ID WHERE a.ATCH_FILE_ID = #{atchFileId} AND a.USE_AT = 'Y' ORDER BY b.FILE_SN

SELECT a.ATCH_FILE_ID , b.FILE_CN , b.FILE_SN , b.FILE_STRE_COURS , b.STRE_FILE_NM , b.FILE_EXTSN , b.FILE_TYPE , b.ORIGNL_FILE_NM , b.FILE_SIZE , a.CREAT_DT FROM COMTN_FILE a INNER JOIN COMTN_FILE_DETAIL b ON UPPER(b.FILE_EXTSN) IN ('GIF','JPG','BMP','PNG') AND a.ATCH_FILE_ID = b.ATCH_FILE_ID WHERE a.ATCH_FILE_ID = #{atchFileId} AND a.USE_AT = 'Y' ORDER BY b.FILE_SN

SELECT ATCH_FILE_ID , FILE_CN , FILE_SN , FILE_STRE_COURS , STRE_FILE_NM , FILE_EXTSN , FILE_TYPE , ORIGNL_FILE_NM , FILE_SIZE FROM COMTN_FILE_DETAIL WHERE ATCH_FILE_ID = #{atchFileId} AND FILE_SN = #{fileSn}
